revision.text:
====EV Formeln==== '''Solange die Effort Values (EV) unter 50 sind:'''
\colorbox{White}{$ \text{EV Damage Multiplier} = 1 + (\text{EV} / 100)$}

'''Sobald die Effort Value (EV) 50 oder höher sind:'''
\colorbox{White}{$ \text{EV Damage Multiplier} = 1 + \text{Min}(1, ((\text{EV} - 30)^{0.075} - 0.75 ))$}
revision.comment:
